abstract_summ: Invasive aspergillosis is a well-known complication of severe influenza pneumonia with acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) Recent studies are reporting emergence of COVID-19 associated aspergalosis (CAPA) The mean age of patients with CAPA was 69 years (Median age: 71, IQR: 24, Range: 51 - 85) and 3/5 patients were male .
